addServer.question: How do I add a new server?
addServer.answer: Click the '+' button in the top right corner of the main screen and enter your server's IP address, SSH port, and authentication details. Both password and SSH key authentication are supported.

docker.question: How do I manage Docker containers?
docker.answer: Ensure Docker is installed on your server and your user has Docker access permissions. Once connected, switch to the Docker tab to view and manage containers.

metrics.question: How are monitoring metrics collected?
metrics.answer: We collect server metrics in real-time through secure SSH connections, including CPU, memory, disk usage, and network traffic. All data is real-time and no additional agent installation is required.

security.question: Is data transmission and storage secure?
security.answer: Yes. All server communication is done through encrypted SSH protocol, and credentials are securely stored in the iOS Keychain. We don't store any sensitive information in the cloud.
